sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.maintenance

Class MaintenancePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Dialog
            • sg.edu.nus.iss.vmcs.maintenance.MaintenancePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class MaintenancePanel
extends java.awt.Dialog
    This panel simulates the vending machines maintainer control panel. It will enable the user (the Maintainer) to:
    1- Log-on using a password;
    2- Display number of Coins of each denomination in the CashStore;
    3- Display total value of cash in the system;
    4- Display total number of cans of each DrinksBrand held in the DrinsStore;
    5- Change the price of any DrinksBrand;
    6- Collect all cash held in they system;
    7- Formally exit from the panel.
    Version:
    3.0 5/07/2003
    Author:
    Olivo Miotto, Pang Ping Li
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearPassword()
      This method clear the password field.
      void closeDown()
      This method remove the panel objects and the maintenance panel from the display.
      void display()
      Display the MaintenancePanel. This will be achieved by displaying the frame of the panel and then sending messages to its constituent objects instructing them to:
      1- Display themselves;
      2- Set initial values;
      3- Deactivate all constituent objects except Password Box and Cash Collection Tray Display.
      void displayCoins(int cc)
      This method displays the amount of money to be issued on the Cash Collection Tray Display.
      void displayPasswordState(boolean st)
      This method displays a message indicating the VALID or INVALID password status.
      void displayPrice(int price)
      This method display the price for the DrinkDisplay.
      void displayTotalCash(int tc)
      This method displays the received value as the total cash held in the CashStore of the vending machine.

      This method returns the CoinDisplay.

      This method returns the DrinksDisplay.

      This method initiate the collect cash.
      void initTotalCash()
      This method initiate the total cash.

      This method activates or deactivtes the MaintenancePanel and its component objects.
      void updateCurrentQtyDisplay(int type, int qty)
      When transfer all button is pushed, the current display needs to be updated. not required in requirement.
      void updateQtyDisplay(int type, int idx, int qty)
      Use when machinery simulator panel changes qty; It is used to automatically update the displayed quantity in maintenance panel. It is called by Maintenance Controller. Not required in requirement.

        2- Set initial values;
        3- Deactivate all constituent objects except Password Box and Cash Collection Tray Display.

      • updateQtyDisplay

        public void updateQtyDisplay(int type,
                             int idx,
                             int qty)
                      throws VMCSException
        Use when machinery simulator panel changes qty; It is used to automatically update the displayed quantity in maintenance panel. It is called by Maintenance Controller. Not required in requirement.
        Throws:
        VMCSException - if fail to update quantity display.
